title: Person In Lotus Position Medium Skin Tone
description: Represents meditation, yoga, peace, and mindfulness. Often used to convey a sense of calm, spiritual practice, or inner peace, especially for individuals with a medium skin tone.
apple_vendor_description: The person in lotus position, medium skin tone emoji on Apple devices depicts a serene figure in a state of calm contemplation, seated with legs crossed in the classic yoga pose. Apple's signature smooth gradients and soft, rounded forms create a peaceful and grounded aesthetic, with subtle shading that suggests a tranquil posture. This emoji beautifully represents mindfulness, meditation, yoga, or a moment of inner peace and well-being, offering a visual cue for tranquility.
